think_procedure: First, I read the description of the knob. The knob 'max_pred_locks_per_transaction' controls the average number of object locks allocated for each transaction. It does not mention any special values that would change the function of the knob, such as disabling a feature. It only mentions that the default value is 64 and that it can be adjusted if necessary. Therefore, it behaves like a regular numerical knob.
